attributes.action: end insurance companies charging over the top premiums for people who have had cancer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 1 in 3 or us will be affected by cancer during our lives, but all cancers are different and affect people individually. However insurance companies just label everyone as a cancer sufferer whether it is past or present. They then feel they can charge astonomically high premiums and hold people to ransom. This is discrimination and it must stop.
